alert.note: Alert for Charles City; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 4:15PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Chickahominy River above Providence Forge affecting New Kent and Charles City Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chickahominy River above Providence Forge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water is up to 1 FT deep in the garages of an auto parts business along Adkins Rd about 1/2 miles south of the river gauge. Parts of Adkins Rd begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 PM EST Saturday was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river level is expected to very slowly fall through tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.5 feet on 06/03/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 415 AM EST.
